Title: Kogitsune no Shouboutai
Description: ['The three kitsune brothers have moved away from the country and into the city. They use their transformation powers to become young men and start firefighting school to become firefighters.']
Related: ['Prequel: Konglong Baobei: Longshen Yongshi 2', 'Sequel: Konglong Baobei Zhi Shiluo De Wenming']
